name: @totallynotdavid/downloader
description: Get direct download URLs from YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, X, and more.
author: David Duran <dadch1404@gmail.com>

scripts.format: biome format --write . && biome check --write . && bun x prettier "**/*.{md,yml}" --write --print-width=80 --prose-wrap=always
scripts.build: bun run format && bun build src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --minify --external axios --external cheerio
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build
